frontmatter.title: What's New in Ruby 3?
frontmatter.description: Pattern matching, hash filtering, endless methods, forward arguments, typing, and concurrency with Ractors.

frontmatter.title: Getting Started with Apache Kafka
frontmatter.description: Develop a comprehensive understanding of Apache Kafka's architecture, scalability, and distributed systems design principles, empowering organizations to process massive volumes of data reliably.

frontmatter.title: Mastering Bash and Z Shell Scripting Syntax
frontmatter.description: Master advanced shell scripting syntax, including variable management, conditional statements, and looping structures, and gain the skills and knowledge needed to create powerful shell scripts in Linux with this course.

frontmatter.title: Data Iteration with Ruby 2
frontmatter.description: Call and write blocks, reduce code duplication with procs and lambdas, write your own modules.

frontmatter.title: Regular Expression Fundamentals
frontmatter.description: Regular expressions are an essential skill. This course covers the basics of regular expressions, their syntax, and how to optimize them for effectiveness, performance, and maintainability.

frontmatter.title: Integrating Payments with Ruby on Rails
frontmatter.description: How to implement payments in Ruby on Rails applications by building a monthly publication site that allows user subscriptions. Covers integrating with a payments API (Stripe) and storing relevant payment data in the application.

frontmatter.title: Authenticating Users in a Rails Application
frontmatter.description: Implement user authentication in a Rails app. Covers topics user authentication, secure password storage, sessions and cookies for user sign-ins, and form validation.

frontmatter.title: Adding Resources to a Rails Application
frontmatter.description: This course teaches how to represent data models as resources in a Rails application and how to manage the underlying database schema.

frontmatter.title: Ruby on Rails 6: Getting Started
frontmatter.description: Fundamentals of building web app with Rails, including working with the database, models, controllers, and views.

frontmatter.title: Idiomatic Ruby
frontmatter.description: Explore several Ruby language features and libraries that were designed to make programming more fun. Write more elegant by using the tools that Ruby provides.

frontmatter.title: Using React Hooks
frontmatter.description: Learn about the six most commonly used React Hooks, how to create custom React Hooks, and how to integrate React Context with React Hooks for state management solutions similar to Redux.

frontmatter.title: Ruby Beyond the Basics
frontmatter.description: A deeper dive into three big ideas in Ruby: object-oriented programming, functional programming, and metaprogramming.

frontmatter.title: GatsbyJS: Getting Started
frontmatter.description: Learn to create modern static sites with GatsbyJS, React, and GraphQL. Gain foundational knowledge on the JAMStack and GatsbyJS basics, including React component creation. Discover how to use GraphQL to query for data and create a complete static blog site with GatsbyJS.

frontmatter.title: CentOS Essentials
frontmatter.description: Linux essentials including working at command line, reading files, vim, piping, redirection, and file permissions.

frontmatter.title: Test-driven Rails with RSpec, Capybara, and Cucumber
frontmatter.description: Learn test-driven development in Rails from scratch by writing acceptance, controller, and model specs. Utilize the Factory Bot gem to prepare data for specs and test common web development cases.

frontmatter.title: AWS Developer: Getting Started
frontmatter.description: Using AWS services, deploying applications to EC2 with Elastic Beanstalk, storing and retrieving data in RDS and DynamoDB, and architecting infrastructure with CloudFormation.

frontmatter.title: Getting Started with Ember
frontmatter.description: Application creation and structuring, routing incoming requests, using templates and components, passing data and responding with actions, and using Ember CLI.

frontmatter.title: Ruby on Rails 4: Getting Started
frontmatter.description: Learn about Rails controllers, views, models, migrations, emails, background jobs, the asset pipeline, and deployment.

frontmatter.title: OAuth2, OpenID Connect and JSON Web Tokens
frontmatter.description: Learning OAuth2, OpenID Connect, and JWT protocols to implement security requirements for lightweight and cross-platform applications, devices, and services.

frontmatter.title: Learn Redux
frontmatter.description: Redux store, actions, reducers, integrating with react router, dispatching actions, state, reducers, composition.

frontmatter.title: Advanced Node.js
frontmatter.description: Topics covered include modules management, V8, concurrency, event loop, streams, child processes, clusters, npm, and Node's event-driven modules for networking and HTTP web servers.

frontmatter.title: React For Beginners
frontmatter.description: JSX, maintaining state, communication between components, local storage, web sockets, url routing, depoyment.

frontmatter.title: Docker Deep Dive
frontmatter.description: Everything needed to get started with Docker including core concepts of images and containers, orchestration, and enterprise features available.

frontmatter.title: MongoDB Performance
frontmatter.description: Hardware considerations, indexes, index operations, CRUD optimization, clusters.

frontmatter.title: Introduction to Koa Javascript
frontmatter.description: Koa, a web framework for Node.js based on generators. Course includes an introduction to generators and Koa's components.

frontmatter.title: A Practical Start with React 17
frontmatter.description: An overview of React and JSX. Covers app structure, components, type checking with prop-types and unit testing with Jest

frontmatter.title: CSS Grid
frontmatter.description: Fundamentals, tracks, auto-flow, repeat function, sizing, placing, auto-fit, auto-fill, minmax responsive, template areas, auto-flow, alignment, ordering, layout.

frontmatter.title: Single Page Applications with Vue.js
frontmatter.description: Single file components, routing, plugins, modules, state management, server-side rendering, testing, and deploying.

frontmatter.title: Understanding the Foundations of TensorFlow
frontmatter.description: Starting from basics of machine learning with linear regression. Concepts of Tensor, constants, variables, placeholders, sessions, computation graph. Using TensorBoard visualization tool to debug data flow graphs.

frontmatter.title: Go Fundamentals
frontmatter.description: Conditionals, function basics, variables, slices, maps, custom data types with structs, concurrent programming with goroutines.

frontmatter.title: Building Applications with React and Redux
frontmatter.description: Learn how to use React, Redux, React Router to build powerful and fast React applications from the ground up. Use Webpack, Babel, ESLint, Jest, React Testing Library and Enzyme.

frontmatter.title: Webpack Fundamentals
frontmatter.description: From basic to advanced builds, css, images, fonts, tooling, and integrating front end frameworks.

frontmatter.title: Python Fundamentals
frontmatter.description: Strings, collections, modules, objects, exception handling, iterables, classes, file management, shipping code.

frontmatter.title: Gradle Build Tool Fundamentals
frontmatter.description: Builds, wrapper, tasks, phases, dependencies, building a Java project, running tests.

frontmatter.title: Creating Your First Spring Boot Application
frontmatter.description: Stand-alone architecture, starters, auto-configuration, core Spring.

frontmatter.title: Building Applications with Aurelia
frontmatter.description: View, View Models, configuration, routing, templates, bindings, bundling.

frontmatter.title: Getting Started With Elasticsearch
frontmatter.description: Index data, efficient queries, advanced query techniques, filters, analytics.

frontmatter.title: SVG Fundamentals
frontmatter.description: Layout, viewBox, aspect ratio, graphical elements, container elements, gradients, styling, animation.

frontmatter.title: Interactive Computer Graphics with WebGL
frontmatter.description: Vertex shader, fragment shader, canvas, mouse position, window events, rotation, scaling, projection, lighting.

frontmatter.title: CSS3 Typography Techniques
frontmatter.description: TBD

frontmatter.title: CSS3 Media Queries
frontmatter.description: Learn how to limit the scope of CSS styles with media queries.

frontmatter.title: CSS3 Flexbox Essentials
frontmatter.description: Create flexible and grid-based layouts without relying or floats or inline-block elements. Learn how to set up rows adn columns and understand flexbox properties.

frontmatter.title: CSS3 3D Essentials
frontmatter.description: TBD

frontmatter.title: Advanced CSS Animations
frontmatter.description: TBD

frontmatter.title: Webapps with Angular UI
frontmatter.description: TBD

frontmatter.title: Getting Good with Grunt
frontmatter.description: Learn how to automate maintenance tasks such as compilation, unit testing, and linting.

frontmatter.title: Building JavaScript Web Apps
frontmatter.description: Covers all stages of planning and developing a JavaScript-based web app.

frontmatter.title: Bombproof Web Design
frontmatter.description: Learn how to build web sites that will work no matter how your visitors are accessing them.

frontmatter.title: Singe Page Web Apps with Meteor
frontmatter.description: Learn how to build web sites that will work no matter how your visitors are accessing them.

frontmatter.title: Interactive Maps with Google Maps API
frontmatter.description: Use the Google Maps API to create and configure different types of maps, attach events, create and customize markers,and geocoding.

frontmatter.title: CSS Tips and Tricks
frontmatter.description: TBD.

frontmatter.title: JavaScript Testing with Jasmine
frontmatter.description: Learn a behaviour-driven development approach for testing your JavaScript code.

frontmatter.title: jQuery UI Essentials
frontmatter.description: Learning how to use all the widgets in the jQuery UI library including theAPI, how it functions, and common implementations.

frontmatter.title: Canvas Essentials
frontmatter.description: TDD.

frontmatter.title: Responsive Web Design
frontmatter.description: Learn the basics of responsive web design including mobile-first design, fluid and hybrid layouts, flexible images, media queries, and navigation.

frontmatter.title: Virtual Machines with Vagrant
frontmatter.description: Learn how to use Vagrant to create a virtual machine for your development environment.

frontmatter.title: MongoDB for Node.js Developers
frontmatter.description: CRUD, schema design, performance, aggregation.
